subject: image-06-10-25-07-29.jpeg
description_text: Hello, why isn't the brake kilogram display in my driver? Pro x ultra pedals

conversations.body_text: Hi Денис,    The Kg feature was added in later updates, and it’s not yet supported by ProX.  However, PlusX and ProX Ultra do support it.  Since ProX has a different hardware design, further testing and development are required, so we can’t support it at the moment.  Our development team hasn’t provided a specific plan or timeline yet.
